sentences.en: Allergy, sinus , and headache medication, especial - ly during the various pollen seasons.
sentences.cn: 治疗过敏 、 鼻窦炎和头痛的药物, 特别是在各种花粉季节.

sentences.en: Because the horses must walk on the streets, they need especial horseshoes.
sentences.cn: 因为马要在街上行走, 所以它们需要特殊的马蹄铁.

sentences.en: Give my regards to Mary, John and by especial to Grandpa.
sentences.cn: 代我向玛丽 、 约翰,尤其向爷爷问好.

sentences.en: He was Maybelle Merriwether's especial beau , Rene Picard.
sentences.cn: 他是梅贝尔-梅里韦瑟的昵友, 名叫雷内-皮卡德.

sentences.en: I like animals very much, especial birds. Today we'll talk about birds!
sentences.cn: 我非常喜欢小动物, 特别是小鸟. 今天,我们就来谈谈小鸟吧!

sentences.en: I think this is a matter of especial importance.
sentences.cn: 我认为这是一件尤其重要的事情.

sentences.en: If asked, she would have said that Charlotte Stanhope was her especial friend.
sentences.cn: 如果有人问她, 她就会说,夏洛特·斯坦霍普是她的特殊朋友.

sentences.en: Joyce took especial care to include her.
sentences.cn: 乔伊斯特别留意把她加进来。

sentences.en: LTD trading company and have especial advantage in clothing importing & exporting .
sentences.cn: 初步发展成为集织、染、印、做为一体的专业化服装贸易 一条龙.

sentences.en: The authorities took especial interest in him because of his trade union work.
sentences.cn: 因为他在工会工作，官方对他特别感兴趣。

sentences.en: The economic jump is an especial law in economic growth.
sentences.cn: 经济跳跃发展规律是经济增长中的特殊规律.

sentences.en: The physics of such soluble particles is of especial relevance to fog and cloud formation.
sentences.cn: 这种可溶粒子的物理学与云和雾的形成关系特别大.

sentences.en: The soluble giant particles are of especial interest in atmospheric chemistry and rain physics.
sentences.cn: 可溶的特大粒子在大气化学和雨物理学方面特别有意义.

sentences.en: They say you need not to use especial anti - bacteria soap.
sentences.cn: 特别的使用杀细菌肥皂并非必要.

sentences.en: Your especial fear is that it will be your backbone.
sentences.cn: 你特别害怕这是你的脊梁骨.

trans.tran_en: Especial means unusual or special in some way
